WEATHER FORECAST FOR 08 MARCH 2025
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 08 March 2025

T
he prevailing dry weather condition in the island is expected to temporarily change
on March 10,11. Showers may occur at several places in the island, particularly in the
Eastern and Uva provinces.

E
xcept for a few showers in Rathnapura, Galle, Matara and Kaluthara districts in the evening
or night, mainly fair weather will prevail over the island.

M
                       
isty conditions can be expected at several places in the island during the morning.
